class.name: CATDate
class.abstract: An object that enables basic storage and retrieval of dates (not times).

method.name: getDate
method.abstract: Returns the day of the current instance.

method.name: getMonth
method.abstract: Returns the month of the current instance.

method.name: getTime
method.abstract: Returns the time of the current instance as a long.

method.name: getYear
method.abstract: Returns the year of the current instance.

constructor.name: CATDate
constructor.abstract: Initializes a new instance to the specified number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT.

constructor.name: CATDate
constructor.abstract: Initializes a new instance to the specified year, month, and day.

constructor.name: CATDate
constructor.abstract: Initializes a new instance to the specified number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT.

class.name: CATError
class.abstract: An object that enables error handling with internationalization capabilities.

method.name: getComponent
method.abstract: Returns the name of the message catalog associated with the current instance.

method.name: getFatherError
method.abstract: Returns the source error or exception, if any.

method.name: getMsgId
method.abstract: Returns the error message identifier.

method.name: getNLSAdvice
method.abstract: Returns the NLS message for "Advice", replacing parameters with set values.

method.name: getNLSDiagnostic
method.abstract: Returns the NLS message for "Diagnostic", replacing parameters with the values specified, if any.

method.name: getNLSMessage
method.abstract: Returns the error message in the current locale.

method.name: getNLSRequest
method.abstract: Returns the NLS message for "Request", replacing parameters with the values specified, if any.

method.name: setParameter
method.abstract: Provides a parameter value that will be used when computing the error message (see class documentation for details on this topic).

constructor.name: CATError
constructor.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a given error identifier and a given message.

constructor.name: CATError
constructor.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a given error identifier and a given message.

class.name: CATMessageCatalog
class.abstract: A message catalog can be used to provide localized messages.

method.name: get
method.abstract: Returns a translated message string given a message catalog name and key.

class.name: CATSession
class.abstract: An object that represents a client session.

method.name: getCurrentSession
method.abstract: Returns the current CATSession instance based on the current thread.

method.name: getEnv
method.abstract: Returns the environment associated with the current instance.

method.name: getLocale
method.abstract: Returns the client locale.

method.name: getMessageCatalog
method.abstract: Returns the message catalog associated with the current client locale.

method.name: getVolatileProperties
method.abstract: Returns an enumeration of all the volatile properties name (see class documentation for details on this topic).

method.name: getVolatileProperty
method.abstract: Returns a volatile property, i.e.

method.name: removeVolatileProperty
method.abstract: Removes a previously stored volatile property and returns its value, or returns null if the specified property doesn't exist (see class documentation for details on this topic).

method.name: setVolatileProperty
method.abstract: Sets a volatile property, i.e.

class.name: CATSetting
class.abstract: An object that enables the storage of settings for the application in the database persistency.

method.name: delete
method.abstract: Removes an attribute from the repository given the attribute name.

method.name: getBoolean
method.abstract: Returns the attribute value of type boolean given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: getDouble
method.abstract: Returns the attribute value of type double given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: getInt
method.abstract: Returns the attribute value of type int given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: getLong
method.abstract: Returns the attribute value of type long given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: getString
method.abstract: Returns the attribute value of type String given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: saveRepo
method.abstract: Validates attributes modifications and stores them in the database persistency.

method.name: setBoolean
method.abstract: Sets an attribute value of type boolean given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: setDouble
method.abstract: Sets an attribute value of type double given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: setInt
method.abstract: Sets an attribute value of type int given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: setLong
method.abstract: Sets an attribute value of type long given a repository and a parameter name.

method.name: setString
method.abstract: Sets an attribute value of type String given a repository and a parameter name.

constructor.name: CATSetting
constructor.abstract: Initializes a new instance with a given environment.

class.name: CATEnvironment
class.abstract: This object describes the environment of a web application.

class.name: CATSettingException
class.abstract: Thrown when an issue occurs in the management of CATSetting instances.

class.name: DirectoryAccessException
class.abstract: Class wrapping exceptions thrown by implementation of DirectoryAccessImpl

constructor.name: DirectoryAccessException
constructor.abstract: Constructs an Exception with no specified detail message.

constructor.name: DirectoryAccessException
constructor.abstract: Constructs an Exception with the specified detail message.

class.name: DirectoryAccessInterface
class.abstract: Interface providing high level methods accessing LDAP Directory to authenticate a user, check user access and retreive specific attributes in the directory.
